titleStmt.title: A letter to His Most Excellent Majesty King William III shewing, I, the original foundation of the English monarchy, II, the means by which it was remov'd from that foundation, III, the expedients by which it has been supported since that removal, IV, its present constitution, as to all its integral parts, V, the best means by which its grandeur may be for ever maintain'd.
titleStmt.author: Stephens, William, d. 1718.

titleStmt.title: A letter to His Most Excellent Majesty King William III shewing, I, the original foundation of the English monarchy, II, the means by which it was remov'd from that foundation, III, the expedients by which it has been supported since that removal, IV, its present constitution, as to all its integral parts, V, the best means by which its grandeur may be for ever maintain'd.
titleStmt.author: Stephens, William, d. 1718.
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Darby ... and sold by A. Baldwin ...,
